ing: 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chiles, drained
1 (5 ounce) jar green olives, chopped (reserve brine)
des: "Use this dip for parties. Use like  salsa. It is a colorful dip and friends will ask for more when it is gone.  It also keeps well in the refrigerator. Serve with scoop-shaped chips."
ins: Chill a serving bowl in the freezer while you make the salsa. In a mixing bowl, combine the chopped green chiles, onion, green olives, and black olives. Lightly mix in the Cheddar cheese and tomatoes; season to taste with garlic salt and black pepper. If desired, mix in a little bit of the olive brine. Serve in the chilled bowl.
